titleStmt.title: To His Grace, His Majesties High Commissioner, and the Right Honourable the Estates of Parliament. The petition of Alexander Hunter of Muirhouse.
titleStmt.author: Hunter, Alexander, of Muirhouse, fl. 1695.

notesStmt.note: Requests that he should not be imprisoned or punished for the debts which his father incurred.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
